title: 1925 Buffalo Bisons (NFL) season
text:
The 1925 Buffalo Bisons season was their sixth in the <a href="National%20Football%20League">league</a>. The team failed to improve on their <a href="1924%20Buffalo%20Bisons%20%28NFL%29%20season">previous record against league opponents</a> of 6–5, winning one game. They finished fifteenth in the league. 
This was the first season since 1917 that star player <a href="Tommy%20Hughitt">Tommy Hughitt</a> did not take the field for Buffalo; he had retired at the end of the previous season.
